📊 AI-Powered Reading Level Analysis

Our trained models analyze books using:

  • Author Patterns - Leveraging data from 555 authors
  • Enriched Database - 1,087 high-quality lexile scores from Educational Testing Service
  • Lexile Predictions - 85.6L overall accuracy, 5.6L for adult-directed books
  • Enhanced Matching - All books now use enriched scores for consistent results

🎯 How It Works

🤖
Enhanced Lexile System
▼
  • 1,087 enriched lexile scores from Educational Testing Service and MetaMetrics
  • Machine learning fallback with 85.6L overall accuracy
  • Author pattern recognition from 555 children's book authors
  • Smart title matching handles series variations (e.g., "Book Title (Series, #1)")
  • 46.2% of predictions achieve "excellent" accuracy (±10-50L)
🎂
Age Appropriateness
▼
  • Carefully curated reading levels from multiple sources
  • AI-driven age classification with confidence scoring
  • Reading progression support to help children advance
🏷️
Theme-Based Discovery
▼
  • ML-analyzed themes from book descriptions and metadata
  • Multi-theme search powered by TF-IDF similarity
  • Consistent categorization across the entire database
📊
Lexile Level Integration
▼
  • AI-predicted Lexile scores for books without existing ratings
  • Precise reading level filtering and progression
  • Educational alignment with school reading programs
